name: Doof (grub)
description:
Doof a doom clone. Kill zombies to get your score higher. I had fun making this game for the paint game jam there were features I would have liked to add but did not have time. All the same, I am looking forward to playing everyone's games and hope you all enjoy mine.


The song: Crush Me Beautiful by Andy G. Cohen

Special thanks to Catash for playtesting.
